Title: The Umbrella Man
Writer: Michael Grasso, Joe Grasso, Joseph Grasso
Actors: Carter Roy, Rachael Carpani, Abbie Cobb, Rich Williams
Plot: Set in 1983 Pittsburgh, PA, Peter and Annie Brennan face the tragic death of their young son. The boy's death and the subsequent acquittal of his killer, kindles a conspiratorial paranoia ...
